tags: None
review: The doctor listens well, spends good amount of time doing a patient hearing before embarking upon extensive conversation explaining the cause, treatment & care needed. There's an element of personal interest to go out of the way to make the customers comfortable and satisfied with satisfying Q&A.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doc was super friendly and helpful. He made sure that he understood my problem, took time to analyse my grievances properly and gave apt solutions. He made me feel calm and comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor was friendly and took time to explain the issue and suggested the treatment. He listened and explained well about the care procedures.

tags: None
review: Doctor listened to my parents knee problem and provided best possible recommendation for both of them. Very professional *** *** *** ********* *********** ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and has lot of patience.Gives enough time to patient for understanding the problem and provides solution. Went for treatment of thumb fracture.Explained pros and cons also for the treatment.5 stars from my side

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: It was great talking to the Doctors. He was patient and gave us an elaborate answer to our concerns. We were really happy with our visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pediatric Foot and Ankle Conditions,Foot & Ankle,
review: ***** ******* highly recommended. He heard my accessory bone condition patiently, diagnosed it and advised steps to be taken in detail.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He explained me the problem and answered all my questions well. I will definitely visit him again!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Ravindran is excellent, he gives a lot of time to patients,  **** *** ************* ********* *********** very patient and tries to get to the root of the issue and not just treat symptoms.

tags: None
review: Dr. Was really helpful and understood problem and advised to follow what was needful. Happy to be here. They are very patient ppl and the front desk staff as helpful too
